# glossary

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of glossary is to provide a glossary of statistical and R coding terms used in the [PsyTeachR books](https://psyteachr.github.io/){target="_blank"} that can be accessed offline. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of glossary from [GitHub](https://github.com/PsyTeachR/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("psyteachr/glossary")
```


## Access the book offline

``` r
glossary::book()
```
